newsitem.title: GERMANY: Sixt H1 1996 ord. act. profit up 25 pct.
newsitem.headline: Sixt H1 1996 ord. act. profit up 25 pct.

text.p: Group income from ord. activities 12.46 vs 9.97
NOTE - Full name of the German car rental group is Sixt AG.

NOTE - The company said in a compulsory statement that its sales figures reflected a stable tendency in airport business. The market for used cars had also remained stable with regard to prices. Personnel costs rose 14 percent in the period, because of a catch-up effect from the previous year, when costs remained steady despite an increase in personnel.
The group also noted that the low interest rate levels helped financing costs.
Business volume continued to rise at its Sixt Leasing GmbH unit, making a sales and profit growth rate of 10 percent for the full year realistic.
